item.title: A new economic system
item.description: Booms and busts cycles, inflation, credit defaults and economic recessions. These are only a few of the indicators which correlate to an overall instability of the economy. This precariousness, which has been protracted for decades since the 1929 market crash, has proved how the current economic system is not working properly under the present conditions. After the first World War, the 1920s were defined as the “roaring twenties” because of the increasing economic prosperity of those years.
